00077     int getMaxProbeSetNameLength()
00078     {
00079         int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00080         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00081         {
00082             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00083             iMaxProbeSetNameLength = Max(iMaxProbeSetNameLength, (int)pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName().length());
00084         }
00085         return iMaxProbeSetNameLength;
00086     }
